capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Members must be open and honest, prepared to express their views on sensitive cultural heritage issues, and willing to accept and commit to change to protect and manage Aboriginal cultural heritage.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Integrity is crucial as members will handle sensitive cultural heritage matters and must adhere to ethical standards and public sector values.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Members need to show drive and motivation in contributing to the committee's work, demonstrating a commitment to learning and understanding cultural heritage management.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting diverse Aboriginal cultures and perspectives is essential in advising on cultural heritage matters.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Effective communication is key in advising the Minister and Department on cultural heritage matters and in working collaboratively with other committee members.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Members must collaborate with other committee members and stakeholders to address cultural heritage management issues.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Providing leadership, vision, and strategic direction to enhance the profile and integrity of ACHAC.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Members should support and promote innovative ways of thinking and changes in cultural heritage management practices.

skills.name: Cultural Knowledge
skills.description: Applying cultural knowledge and lived experience to advise on the identification, assessment, and care of Aboriginal cultural heritage.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Providing leadership, vision, and strategic direction to the committee.

skills.name: Corporate Governance
skills.description: Ensuring effective and sound corporate governance in committee operations.

skills.name: Innovative Thinking
skills.description: Introducing new ways of thinking to address cultural heritage management issues.

generalRole.name: Aboriginal Cultural Heritage Advisory Committee Member
generalRole.title: Aboriginal Cultural Heritage Advisory Committee Member
generalRole.description: This role involves advising on the identification, assessment, and care of Aboriginal cultural heritage in NSW, requiring a deep understanding of cultural heritage management and the ability to work collaboratively and communicate effectively.
